titles.title: A resolution to refer S. 279, entitled "A bill for the relief of the heirs of Clark M. Beggerly, Sr., of Jackson County, Mississippi" to the chief judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims for a report thereon.

A resolution to refer S. 279, entitled "A bill for the relief of the heirs of Clark M. Beggerly, Sr., of Jackson County, Mississippi" to the chief judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims for a report thereon.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Refers S. 279 (private relief) to the chief judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims for a report.
